Note: Followed by 6313 without break in Oxford, Bodleian Library Ashmole 42 (SC 6923), Cambridge UK, Cambridge University Library Dd.1.1, San Marino, CA, Henry Huntington Library HM 129 [olim Phillipps 20420].
_description: Gospel, ‘In die sancti Iohannis ad missam matutinalem,’ in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Still þan stode sir zacharieand þoȝt of þis
                    tithand ferlie…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…If ȝe will listen & hald ȝou stillI sall
                    ȝow tell it wiþ gode will
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

CULDd11.First Lines:
fful stille stod þan sire ȝacharye& þouhte of
                    þis tyding ferlye…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…And to his blisse he vs bringeÞat of nouht made al
                    thinge
CULDd11.Note: No marked break between this and the preceding 4247 in this MS.

CULGg531.First Lines:
Styll stode syr ȝacharyAnd thoght of þis tythand
                    folly…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…And þar scho toke in hyr ihesusþat with hys blode
                    on rode botht vs
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
In die ad messam natiuitatis matutinalis (f.
                    155v)

HunHM129.First Lines:
Still stode Syr ZacharyAnd þoght off þis tythand
                    ferly…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…And þare scho toke in hir ihesusÞat with his blode
                    on rode boght vs
